SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Boss
Represents a Boss entity in the game, which is a type of FighterPlane.
BossProjectile
Represents a projectile fired by the Boss entity.
BossTest
Test class for the Boss.
ButtonImage
Represents an image used as a button in the GUI.
CollisionHandler
Handles collisions between various entities in the game.
CollisionHandlerTest
Test class for the CollisionHandler.
Controller
Controller class that manages the game flow and transitions between levels.
ControlsHandler
Handles user controls for the game.
DestructibleEntity
Represents an entity in the game that can be destroyed.
DestructibleEntityHandler
Handles destructible entities in the game.
DestructibleEntityHandlerTest
Test class for the DestructibleEntityHandler.
DestructibleInterface
Represents an interface for destructible entities.
EndMenu
Represents the end menu in the game.
EnemyInterface
Represents an interface for enemy entities.
EnemyPlane
Represents an enemy plane in the game.
EnemyProjectile
Represents a projectile fired by an enemy plane.
FighterPlane
Represents a fighter plane in the game.
GameEntity
Represents a game entity with an image.
HeartDisplay
Represents a display of user health/hearts in the GUI.
HeartPowerup
Represents a heart power-up in the game.
LevelFour
Represents the fourth level of the game.
LevelOne
Represents the first level of the game.
LevelParent
Represents a parent class for game levels.
LevelThree
Represents the third level of the game.
LevelTwo
Represents the second level of the game.
LevelView
Represents the view/user interface for a level in the game.
Main
Main class that serves as the entry point for the JavaFX application.
MainMenu
Represents the main menu of the GUI.
MenuImage
Represents an image of the menu of the GUI.
Powerup
Represents a power-up in the game.
Projectile
Represents a projectile in the game.
ShieldImage
Represents an image of a shield in the GUI.
ShieldImageTest
Test class for the ShieldImage.
UserPlane
Represents the user's plane in the game.
UserPlaneTest
Test class for the UserPlane.
UserProjectile
Represents a projectile fired by the user in the game.
Window
Represents a window in the application.
WindowTest
Test class for the Window.
